Programmes.Desc: Students accepted into the Automotive Engineering program offered by University of Windsor  will begin with one year of graduate study in Windsor taking courses and working on a research thesis that is defined and supported by FCA (Fiat Chrysler Automobiles) North America.

The MEng in Engineering Materials offered by University of Windsor is a research-based program in which you complete four graduate level courses and a t may be awarded upon successful completion of a total of eight courses (the MEng has no research component/thesis/work with a faculty supervisor).

The MEng in Civil Engineering offered by University of Windsor may be awarded upon successful completion of a total of eight courses (the MEng has no research component/thesis/work with a faculty supervisor).

An MEng Degree may be awarded upon successful completion of a total of eight courses (the MEng has no research component/thesis/work with a faculty supervisor). The Electrical Engineering program is offered by University of Windsor.

An MEng in Industrial Engineering offered by University of Windsor may be awarded upon successful completion of a total of eight courses (the MEng has no research component/thesis/work with a faculty supervisor).

An MEng Degree in Mechanical Engineering at University of Windsor may be awarded upon successful completion of a total of eight courses (the MEng has no research component/thesis/work with a faculty supervisor).

Master of Environmental Engineering offered by University of Windsor is a course-based program designed for working professionals or recent graduates who want to increase their knowledge in multiple  advanced topics.
The University of Windsor Master�s program in Social Work is geared toward students seeking advanced professional knowledge and skills within an ecological systems perspective.
The School of Creative Arts offers an MFA in Film and Media Arts program at University of Windsor.
Our MSc Biological Sciences program at University of Windsor is intended for students seeking training in the biological sciences beyond the BSc degree.
The Department of Environmental and Earth Sciences at the University of Windsor offers both MSc and PhD degree programs  where we excel in providing innovative approaches to important problems.

Our two-year MSc Environmental Science program at University of Windsor offers research opportunities that help develop advanced laboratory and field skills using the institute�s multi-disciplinary approach.
The Master of Arts degree in History at University of Windsor combines an intensive project of research with an orientation to contemporary modes of historical interpretation.
The Master in Kinesiology and Sport Management Leadership program is offered by University of Windsor.
University of Windsor Law�s LLM students take courses that enable them to develop a strong research foundation and deepen their knowledge in a given legal or socio-legal field.

In the Advanced Clinical Nursing field students at University of Windsor will explore the human experience of health  well-being  illness and healing within the context of individuals  families  groups and communities.
The MA in Philosophy at the University of Windsor focuses on studies in social and political critique  broadly construed  and in reasoning and argumentation.
The University of Windsor Master�s program in Sociology has a well-established reputation for critical and contemporary scholarship.

The Master of Fine Arts Program in Visual Arts at the University of Windsor is a two-year  studio-centered program geared towards creative exploration  innovative experimentation and the development of a sustainable artistic practice.

The MA in Communication and Social Justice program at University of Windsor offers students a distinctive opportunity to pursue their diverse scholarly interests in a vibrant  supportive atmosphere conducive to addressing issues of social justice in a variety of contexts.

Our Master�s programs in English with fields in Literature & Language and Literature & Creative Writing at University of Windsor  prepare students to understand the power of language  and to develop their critical and creative thinking and writing skills.
Our department at University of Windsor offers comprehensive programs of study in Chemistry and Biochemistry at the Graduate level.
The MA in Criminology offered by University of Windsor is designed to meet the growing demand for highly qualified personnel in criminology.

The Political Science department at University of Windsor offers two exciting paths to pursue graduate work: an M.A. degree  which can generally be completed in one calendar year (September to September) through the completion of courses and either a major research paper or a master's thesis.

Students who are most successful in Psychology programs at University of Windsor are academic high-achievers with strong interest in the science of human behaviour  well-developed interpersonal skills  and the desire to help improve the lives of others through careers in research and professional practice.

The objective of the M.Sc. Physics program offered by University of Windsor is to immerse students in the excitement of original discovery  and to further develop their analytic skills and powers of critical thought.

Graduate courses at the Department of Mathematics and Statistics at University of Windsor are offered in a large range of topics in mathematics  statistics  probability  optimization  and actuarial sciences.
Accelerate your engineering career by obtaining a Master of Engineering Management (MEM) degree from the University of Windsor.
The University of Windsor offers a Master's degree in Materials Chemistry and Engineering.

The thesis-based Master of Science in Computer Science program offered by University of Windsor provides students with skills and knowledge necessary to pursue doctoral studies or a professional career in the rapidly changing computing and technology fields and in the rapidly advancing field of artificial intelligence  considering the MSc in CS � Artificial Intelligence stream outlined below.
Strengthen your application for medical school and prepare for a succesful career by earning your Master's degree in Translational Health Sciences from University of Windsor.

The Master of Applied Economics and Policy program offered by University of Windsor is designed to offer a unique combination of courses that will prepare you for work in the specialized field of economic policy.
Our Master of Education and Educational Studies program at University of Windsor is taught by a highly diverse faculty team that strives to enhance each student�s professional and scholarly growth.

The Actuarial Science programme at University of Windsor will prepare you for the professional exams necessary to become an Actuary in North America with accreditation accepted in many other parts of the world.

The Master of Medical Biotechnology offered by University of Windsor is a professional program that provides students with both a solid foundation of the theoretical concepts and practical industrially- applicable laboratory technique experiences used in medical biotechnology industries.

Course-based  professional Applied Computing program offered by University of Windsor that will provide students with a solid foundation of the industry oriented practical aspects of computer science.
The Master of Management offered by University of Windsor is a unique program that offers you the benefits of a world-class business education with the personal touch of a small school.

Our Odette Master of Business Administration (MBA) at University of Windsor provides students with personalized preparation for a successful career in business. This unique program offers students a fast-paced learning environment using an experiential approach to education.
The University of Windsor offers a Master's degree in Business Administration - Managers and professionals
The Department of Economics of the University of Windsor offers an intellectually demanding and stimulating M.A. program.
The University of Windsor offers a Master's degree in Business Administration - Professional accounting specialization
